organic.title: The Basics of Attack Composition | SF Seminar
organic.snippet: The time period from when the attack starts, up until the active frames begin, is called "startup." The fewer startup frames there are, the faster the attack will come out. Attacks with fast startup usually cannot be beaten, so it's okay to think in terms of fast = strong. Attack Active Frames.

organic.title: Onimusha: Warlords Official Web Manual
organic.snippet: TOP; Game Tips; Attack Guide. Attack Guide. Attack Types. By using different weapons and combining Button ( Button ) and Button in various ways, you can perform all sorts of attacks. Each type of attack has its own power, range, and duration. Use each type well and you'll be victorious in battle. Thrust. Thrust.

organic.snippet: - You and a Monstie attack the same monster - You and this Monstie choose the same attack type (skills also apply, but if you choose a skill or a Monstie uses a skill to attack all enemies instead of just one, a Double Attack will not occur) - The attack type you chose beats the one chosen by the monster. organic.title: Actions|Resident Evil 3 Official Web Manual
organic.snippet: Use or aim your weapon with the moment before an enemy attack impacts and an even faster Perfect Dodge will be executed. Use immediately following a Perfect Dodge and you'll immediately aim directly at the enemy's weak point. This is the perfect chance to launch a counter attack with ! Shoulder Charge (Carlos Only).
